idea-plugin.name: Current Fragment
idea-plugin.description:
Current Fragment lets you inspect the active Activity and any visible Fragments of a connected Android app via ADB (Android 7-14).

Usage: Trigger the action with the Alt+0 shortcut (or via the Code menu) to instantly dump the current Activity/Fragment stack.

Note: This plugin is in its initial phase—expect rapid iterations and please share feedback.
